duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and execute all private events and assist with operational functions within the department.
Assume the role of the main point of contact between the client and all departments within the property.
Conduct demographic research for events and advise the marketing team on the viability of potential events.
Create a work environment that promotes teamwork, performance feedback, recognition, mutual respect, and employee satisfaction.
Ensure necessary meeting facilities are reserved where applicable.
Maintain a professional, neat, and well‐groomed appearance.
Participate in weekly operations and events meetings with internal departments.
Perform all job‐related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Degree Required in Event Management or Hospitality
